metadata.title: CVE-2021-33120 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Out of bounds read under complex microarchitectural condition in memorysubsystem for some Intel Atom(R) Processors may allow authenticated user topotentially enable information disclosure or cause denial of service vianetwork access.

criterions.comment: intel-microcode: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'early microcode loading not allowed').
